Entry.JapaneseText: もしかしたら、ラドラス様は ゲオルギアスの復活を感じて……
Entry.EnglishText: Could it be that King Ladras had felt that Geyorkias would be resurrected...

Entry.JapaneseText: それに対抗するために人々のフォルスを 覚醒させたんじゃないでしょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: ...And he awakened people's Force in order to counter it...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そうだとしたら、ゲオルギアスの復活は お父様の遺志にそむく事に……
Entry.EnglishText: ...If that were the case, then reviving Geyorkias would be against the will of my father...

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ様……ラドラス陛下は、誰よりも カレギアの平和を願っておられました。
Entry.EnglishText: Queen Agarte... King Ladras desired Callegea's peace more than anyone else.

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下は必ずわかって下さるはずです。
Entry.EnglishText: Surely he would understand why we are doing this.
